title: Designation of advance health-care directive
context: [ยง286-109.4] Designation of advance health-care directive. On the application form for any driver&rsquo;s license or license renewal, the examiner of drivers shall ask the applicant to designate whether the applicant has an advance health-care directive. The examiner of drivers shall issue or renew a license bearing the designation &ldquo;advance health-care directive&rdquo;, a symbol, or an abbreviation thereof, for those applicants who have so indicated. &ldquo;Advance health-care directive&rdquo; means an individual instruction in writing, a living will, or a durable power of attorney for health care decisions. No specific medical treatment information shall be imprinted on the driver&rsquo;s license. [L 2000, c 295, ยง1]
